data.expected_result: The message should appear in search results
data.short_description: When emojis aren't Discord-style and in a URL, they aren't searchable https://i.imgur.com/yYDZzKQ.png
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a URL with emoji in it - they can't be the Discord ones, they need to be the "default" ones (they appear small) - Search for the emojis, and the URL will not appear in the results
